202.description: Approval required before action can execute for direct publish create.

409.description: Approval invalid (pending, expired, rejected, already executed, or payload mismatch).

parameters.name: X-Admin-Approval-Id
parameters.description: Required to execute a previously approved action for direct publish create.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Break-Glass-Reason
parameters.description: Emergency single-operator override reason. Accepted only when break-glass policy is enabled.

202.description: Approval required before action can execute for bulk publish execution.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Approval-Id
parameters.description: Required to execute a previously approved action for bulk publish execution.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Break-Glass-Reason
parameters.description: Emergency single-operator override reason. Accepted only when break-glass policy is enabled.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Step-Up-Token
parameters.description: Fresh admin step-up token.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Step-Up-Token

put.description: Updates an announcement. If this request transitions the record to `published`, step-up and approval workflow controls are enforced.

202.description: Approval required before publish transition can execute

409.description: Approval invalid (pending, expired, rejected, already executed, or payload mismatch).

parameters.name: X-Admin-Step-Up-Token
parameters.description: Required when this update performs a publish transition.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Approval-Id
parameters.description: Required to execute a previously approved publish transition.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Break-Glass-Reason
parameters.description: Emergency single-operator override reason. Accepted only when break-glass policy is enabled.

202.description: Approval required before action can execute for delete execution.

409.description: Approval invalid (pending, expired, rejected, already executed, or payload mismatch).

parameters.name: X-Admin-Approval-Id
parameters.description: Required to execute a previously approved action for delete execution.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Break-Glass-Reason
parameters.description: Emergency single-operator override reason. Accepted only when break-glass policy is enabled.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Step-Up-Token
parameters.description: Fresh admin step-up token.

202.description: Approval required before action can execute for publish execution.

409.description: Approval invalid (pending, expired, rejected, already executed, or payload mismatch).

parameters.name: X-Admin-Approval-Id
parameters.description: Required to execute a previously approved action for publish execution.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Break-Glass-Reason
parameters.description: Emergency single-operator override reason. Accepted only when break-glass policy is enabled.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Step-Up-Token
parameters.description: Fresh admin step-up token.

post.description: Rolls back an announcement to a version snapshot. Step-up is required. If the target snapshot is `published`, approval workflow controls are also required.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Step-Up-Token
parameters.description: Fresh admin step-up token.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Approval-Id
parameters.description: Required when executing an approved rollback to a published snapshot.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Break-Glass-Reason
parameters.description: Emergency single-operator override reason. Accepted only when break-glass policy is enabled.

202.description: Approval required before rollback-to-published can execute

409.description: Approval invalid (pending, expired, rejected, already executed, or payload mismatch).

post.summary: Replace URL across links and announcements

post.description: Reverts to a historical version. Step-up and approval-grade permissions are required. If the target snapshot is `published`, approval workflow controls are enforced.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Step-Up-Token
parameters.description: Fresh admin step-up token.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Approval-Id
parameters.description: Required when executing an approved revert to a published snapshot.

parameters.name: X-Admin-Break-Glass-Reason
parameters.description: Emergency single-operator override reason. Accepted only when break-glass policy is enabled.

202.description: Approval required before revert-to-published can execute

409.description: Approval invalid (pending, expired, rejected, already executed, or payload mismatch).
